title: Armoured Tail
data:
{| cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" border="1" |- style="font-style:italic;" |Rank||Effect||Flavor |- |1||[[Auxiliary]] tail attack.||You have a long armoured tail. |- | colspan="3" | '''Damage:''' 10
'''Chance''': 50% * (30 + XL)/59 per melee attack
The [[Stinger]] mutation adds 2 * (Stinger ranks) - 1 damage and gives [[Venom]] brand. |- | colspan="3" | '''Species notes:''' Exclusive to [[Armataur]]s. |- style="font-style:italic;" | colspan="3" | [[Good_mutations|Good mutation]] |} [[Category:Mutations]] [[Category:Good Mutations]]
